name: DINTE - The Cursed Dragon
description:
A GAME MADE FOR UDC GameJam  https://itch.io/jam/udc-jam-week-15 

THEME "DEATH IS NOT THE END"

DINTE THE CURSED DRAGON

A Platform Puzzle game where you have to solve puzzles using your powers. 

STORY

Dinte is a little dragon who was cursed and could travel to the underworld and back. Nobody wanted to be his friend and when he find himself in this new strange world he decided to explore in hopes to find someone to befriend.

CONTROLS

A D to move left and right

Space to Jump

F - Take control of your ghost / Call your ghost back
